lexUnit.name: desertion.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: leaving a post of obligation in violation of oath or orders

sentence.text: In Liverpool William Rathbone extracted figures from the muster roles which Clarkson used as the basis for the statistics on mortality , disease and desertion amongst seamen engaged in the slave trade and which apparently impressed the Privy Council committee .
